I got this game working fine and I'll tell you guys how, since it seems that there's a lot of ppl saying that it works fine but not saying how. It's the same procedure as what xeroy said but I'll just go more in depth.

1. downloaded the file
2. unrared the only rar file in the folder into a new folder, doesnt matter where, I did it on the desktop.
(I didn't have to mount anything using Daemon, but if for some reason you feel that you need to, just mount the 'DIAG' file in the unrared folder then follow step 3.)
3. I installed the game using the installer in the unrared folder.
4. I then installed the update v1.09 enclosed in the 'Crack' folder which is in the unrared folder as well.
5. after that is done installing, copy the executable in 'Crack' to where the game was installed on the hard drive (usually C:/Program Files/Firaxis Games/Sid Meier's Civilization 4) and replace the existing one. (the file should look like the top of a pillar).
6. After that's done you can delete the new folder that you unrared everything to and unmount everything as well.
7. The next step is to just play the game(double click the new icon on the desktop...duh.)...

It should be as simple as that unless you misread something, or your computer is gay.

by the way, if you get a new text file named 'diag' on the desktop, just move it to the folder where the game's installed, that's just what i did. It's as simple as that :)

Thanks reflex69 for the download, easy for even me.
